SEARCH
Package Millgame.Controller

Klasse Controller

java.lang.Object
Millgame.Controller.Controller
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
IController
public class Controller extends Object implements IController
Controller has knowledge of Model and View. Methods and Variables should only be referenced by the Model. Accessibility is given by Mill Model. Variables and Methods should only be referenced or called by Value.

  • Methodendetails

    • setModel

      public void setModel(Model model)
      Refer model to Controller and set model. Typically used in Main.Main to set the Model for Controller.
      Parameter:
      model - as Mill Model

    • setView

      public void setView(IView view)
      Refer view to Controller and set this view. Typically used in Main.Main to set View for Controller.
      Parameter:
      view - as Mill Model

    • nextFrame

      public void nextFrame()
      draws the next frame in game. it depends on current game state. Typically used to change the drawing state in view.
      Angegeben von:
      nextFrame in Schnittstelle IController

    • setRestartGame

      public void setRestartGame()
      changes gamestate to restart Typically used to restart the Game and to set the default value.
      Angegeben von:
      setRestartGame in Schnittstelle IController

    • getPlayer1

      public GameState getPlayer1()
      gets the current state of Player 1 Typically used in View to compare gamestate with a specific value.
      Angegeben von:
      getPlayer1 in Schnittstelle IController
      Gibt zurück:
      state of player 1

    • userInput

      public void userInput(boolean clicked)
      Sets the position of Players input with given parameters. Checks if Player has made a correct Move. Typically used in View to send the MouseX and MouseY into Controller.
      Angegeben von:
      userInput in Schnittstelle IController
      Parameter:
      clicked - checks the x and y for mouse clicked
